website_summaries.verdict: If you can overlook the fact that it costs too much, the MW60 is beautifully designed wireless headphone that delivers very good performance.
pros: The Master and Dynamic MW60 wireless Bluetooth headphone is constructed out of premium materials and has excellent build quality along with strong sound for a Bluetooth headphone
It folds up and comes with a decent carrying case and a cable for wired listening
Battery life (16 hours) was good, and the Bluetooth connectivity was impressively steady with extended range
cons: The headphones are expensive, somewhat heavy and may not fit people with smaller heads
Lacks dual microphones for reducing ambient noise during calls

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, Wireless & Functional!
customer_reviews.text: Hands-down, these headphones are my favorite for everyday use. I get compliments on the style and look. I also get “wow” responses from audio pros who get to try them. The pair has the best of bluetooth and wired technology with long lasting battery life. I own many pairs of headphones for various use cases, ranging from monitoring music production in the studio to noise cancellation for travel, so having these MW60 complete my collection of the best headphones out there. And they are better than Beats!!!! I wish they had noise cancellation for the. Nonetheless, the isolation works well. This purchase was definitely a splurge as the price is too steep in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jim T.

customer_reviews.title: Too Much Criticism, Not Enough Praise
customer_reviews.text: Bottom line: these sound and look amazing. A lot of people are not telling the truth on here. Not only do these cans look appealing, they sound sharp and precise. Yes, they don’t sound as good as the MH40, but the difference is extremely small. People need to also remember these are wireless; you won’t get the same quality when wired up. Worth the price for the look alone, the sound is just a plus.
customer_reviews.author: HECTOR HERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: Highway Robbery? Nope, This Price Is Grand Larceny!!
customer_reviews.text: Quick and dirty, I owned this when they first came out and I returned them because I agree it was overpriced. But not now, this is an outstanding value and I am not sure what is better really right now given the money spent. Not sure where the problem is regarding sound quality, I just use a Note 9 and I am completely satisfied with just listening with wired connection. I could use my dragonfly cobalt with tidal and easily blow most people’s minds. Run, don’t walk. Bargains like this don’t come around too often.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Sound
customer_reviews.text: Prefect..... tones are great, comfortable around the ear so far over an hour and 30min without distractions ....color is vibe texture is niceee...outstanding - no regret on purchase
customer_reviews.author: CRJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Build quality and materials are excellent. Sound quality is also extremely good with superior isolation of separate tonal ranges. I absolutely love listening to classical music in these. My only small criticism would be that when used wirelessly, the max volume is a little low. When using wired, max volume is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Byron

customer_reviews.title: Returned these; opted for wired headset
customer_reviews.text: Red is pretty but white looks better on women (opinion). I kept the MW40 in white. This set is heavy, reviews say sound quality not as good as wired.
customer_reviews.author: Twenty McGill

customer_reviews.title: Premium craftsmanship materials
customer_reviews.text: My only complain is the pinch on my earlobes because the size is a bit on a snug side.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod De Defi

customer_reviews.title: Looks aren’t everything
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and I mean Beautiful but sound quality doesn’t match the appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Willie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound wise these are one of the best wireless headphones not yet as staggy as on the B&w px
customer_reviews.author: Peter Mekhail

customer_reviews.title: There’s no better value for money out there, if you like stylish and great sound headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound, sublime design and build quality. Modern classic, full of style.
customer_reviews.author: lucho

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The audio quality is insanely good, one things I don’t like about it is when I’m listening music through BT connection, there is a delay on the first couple secs, overall, it’s a nice and valuable grab
customer_reviews.author: Jkong95

customer_reviews.title: Terrible connection, subpar sound
customer_reviews.text: Arguably the best looking headphones out there, but that's the only redeeming quality. I gave up after three days. The bluetooth connection is _extremely_ fragile. Also wasn't expecting such a bass-heavy sound. Extremely disappointed and will stay away from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Almér

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical at first, but then...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing price, fast delivery. These master & dynamics are the best headphones I have ever owned. Crystal clear highs and midds, warm and vibrant lows. Honestly, I was only able to afford them because of this sellers deep discount. Would absolutely purchase from again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stylish headphone.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this headphone. Been a fan of Master & Dynamic for a long time. I have been looking everywhere in store for this exact color scheme. But no one has it. Managed to find this with a great price, brand new from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sounds quality, corroded wires.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look and sound of these headphones, the only problem I do have is the wires that came with them. Both wires and the auxiliary extension were badly corroded and unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Darling

customer_reviews.title: Unsure of overall quality because of the clarity not received during phone calls
customer_reviews.text: Sounds ok but not as good as you'd expect. Maybe it's the headphones I received but I'm not sure. Hopefully the seller will contact me back. I haven't had a chance to contact the seller yet because of family obligations. However they do not work well at all for phonecalls which leads me to believe the overall quality should be better
customer_reviews.author: FreeDrinks

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality, good audio quality with minor issues in certain situations.
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. Arrived with most of a full charge, and sound quality was decent. Product gets one star off because sound quality seems to suffer when paired with two devices (though manual says it works with two devices and will switch between them as necessary, mine kept making pairing sounds intermittently until I factory reset it) and also when vehicles move past (other reviews described this product as crystal clear regardless of environment, so I thought this needed sharing). Sound quality is good, other than the issue described above - these reproduce bass frequencies fairly well, but they'll never be thumpers. Build quality is really good - I get compliments on them often, and they feel very solid.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Tang

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Great look and it’s really well made. Love the color and best for the money
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.text: These headphone are absolutely amazing. They sound great and isolate noise really well.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: nice build
customer_reviews.text: I love the weight and feel to them. They are on the heavy side
customer_reviews.author: Rein Family

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality and build. It had a cosmetic issue on one of the ear pads. I contacted master & dynamics care and they shipped a replacement ear cup. Truely 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Less comfortable with more appealing sound reproduction than B & W P5s
customer_reviews.text: Less comfortable that the Bowers and Wilkins wireless P5s, but a step up in sound quality. Worth the price difference? It was for me. Only you can judge for yourself. I saved money buying used on Amazon.com. At risk of using overworked clichés, the HW60s are more "transparent" and less "artificial" than the P5s. But I can wear the P5s for hours without discomfort. The fit of the HW60s seems unnatural from the moment they are put on and after a couple of hours relief is needed. A couple of hours is usually long enough for me when listening to music. When listening to recorded books however, it is a regrettably short time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Schlenker

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes, however these turned out to be a waste of time. Was anticipating much louder sound, as well as, greater sound quality. Compared to my $300 bose the MW60's actually had a little less kick, with slightly better sound quality. Definitely not worth $500. Extremely overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headphones. Sounds great and bluetooth connection is the best I have experienced so far.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ko

customer_reviews.title: Skull Crushingly Tight on My Head
customer_reviews.text: Pretty with great sound... but useless if you have a big head. I REALLY wanted to love these once I saw the build quality. Unfortunately they were intensely painful to wear. I'm 6'4" so I don't have a small head, but I'm not Shrek either :) Someone needs to clue in M&D that Americans are big. We need headphones that don't crush your skull. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: dkoretz

customer_reviews.title: Really? A $550+ dollar pair of headphones and In ...
customer_reviews.text: Really? A $550+ dollar pair of headphones and In the first minute of turning them on (fully charged) the sound cuts out 10+ times? Paired with a Moto Droid smartphone within a foot of each other and I'm sitting down at a desk. Returning. Not worth the money nor the effort to ship them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Alan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Well I went for it. I love music and it was time. I went for it and couldn't be happier. It's EVERYTHING and more what they say about them. Beautiful! 😎👍
customer_reviews.author: Paul  G

customer_reviews.title: I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for two days and then one side stopped. I own many Master and Dynamic products, but this makes me concerned about buying future products. I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: mike peek

product_meta.title: Master & Dynamic MW60 Wireless Bluetooth Foldable Headphones - Premium Over-The-Ear Headphones - Noise Isolating - Portable
product_meta.description: Color:Silver Metal/Brown LeatherThe MW60 provides listeners with a signature sound and a signature aesthetic. Our high-quality headphone combines design with the highest specifications to provide noise isolation and an unmatched listening experience. Made to complement a diverse range of musical genres, these studio quality headphones offer a superior sound signature that captures the extraordinary detail found in well-recorded music. MW60 wireless headphones feature best-in-class connectivity thanks to Bluetooth 4. 1 with Apt. High performance 45mm neodymium drivers and a signal range 4x industry standard with a 16 hour battery life combine provide recording studio-level sound in the convenience of a wireless headphone. MW60 Wireless Over Ear Headphones have the perfect balance of aesthetics, strength, comfort and sound and are engineered to last. With leather ear pads that fold, lightweight stainless steel and aluminum, MW60 gives you the best of portability and lasting comfort in a single headphone. As an industry leader, Master & Dynamic is known for designing sophisticated headphones that look as beautiful as they sound.
feature_bullets: Technically superior - master & dynamic has a deep passion for designing technically sophisticated headphones that look as beautiful as they sound.  The MW60 features best in class signal range Using Bluetooth 4. 1 with apt and a patent pending antennae. Other features include: 45mm neodymium drivers, 16-hour battery life, removable ear pads, inline mic. And foldable design.

Rich sound - tuned for a rich, warm sound, The MW60 offers a natural, detailed, live sound signature that captures the exceptional detail of well-recorded music.  Our Tuning is designed to Compliment a diverse range of musical genres. Impedance- 32ohms

Premium materials - Built  for decades of use and beautifully designed using the highest quality luxury materials including premium leather, Stainless steel, and aluminum - creating an Iconic, durable and timeless look.  Key components, including lambskin ear pads and woven cords, are designed to be replaceable to ensure longevity. Accessories include: protective carrying case, USB charging cable, 2. 0m standard cable, 3. 5/6. 3mm Gold plated adapter and leather storage box
Industry leader - positively reviewed and highly praised by industry leaders for both sound and build quality.  Wired Magazine named the MW60 “best Bluetooth headset”

Master & dynamic offers a limited 2 year against defect.  The headphones come with a unique serial Code to register the product to ensure priority service.  Please make sure headphones are purchased from an authorized reseller to coverage.
